item.title: Erin add a quote by Judith Viorst
item.description: "Strength is the capacity to break a Hershey bar into four pieces with your bare hands - and then eat just one of the pieces." -- Judith Viorst

item.title: Erin add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Erin add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You can never be overdressed or overeducated." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Erin add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Erin add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "Who wills, Can. Who tries, Does. Who loves, Lives." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: Erin add a quote by Tina Fey
item.description: "Some people say, “Never let them see you cry.” I say, if you’re so mad you could just cry, then cry. It terrifies everyone." -- Tina Fey

item.title: Erin add a quote by Mary Roach
item.description: "The way I see it, being dead is not terribly far off from being on a cruise ship. Most of your time is spent lying on your back. The brain has shut down. The flesh begins to soften. Nothing much new happens, and nothing is expected of you. " -- Mary Roach

item.title: Erin add a quote by Shanna Swendson
item.description: "But when I clicked over to my e-mail program, it was just another “great opportunity” spam, this time adding the words “don’t delete!” to the subject line. With a sense of perverse satisfaction, I deleted it. It was probably the only act of rebellion I’d get away with all day." -- Shanna Swendson
